not_sure_if_for_you.name: I'm Not Sure If It's For You, But
not_sure_if_for_you.pattern: I'm not sure if {offer} is for you, BUT {benefit}
examples: I'm not sure if buying a home in this market is the best option for you, BUT if you're ready to make a move, I can show you how my clients have been winning
I'm not sure if our VIP Buyer program is something that would interest you, BUT it does give you access to off-market properties
I'm not sure if it's for you, BUT I know the best approach to helping buyers win in multiple offers

open_minded.name: Do You Consider Yourself Open-Minded
open_minded.purpose: Getting people unstuck, challenging their current approach
open_minded.pattern: Do you consider yourself open-minded because if you do I can show you {solution}
examples: Do you consider yourself open-minded because if you do I can show you how my clients have been winning offers
Do you consider yourself open-minded if so I can show you how to cover an appraisal gap with 25 cents on the dollar out of pocket?
Do you consider yourself an open-minded person because the way you are approaching real estate is not working - are you open to a different approach?

how_would_it_feel.name: How Would It Feel If
how_would_it_feel.purpose: Showing outcomes, creating emotional connection to consequences
examples: How would it feel if you wrote this offer and lost because you didn't waive the appraisal?
How would it feel if you were to look back 6 months from now and realize you missed the best chance in our lifetime to buy a house?
How would it feel if you did get this house?

havent_gotten_around.name: I'm Guessing You Haven't Gotten Around To
havent_gotten_around.purpose: Moving people to action with gentle accountability
havent_gotten_around.pattern: I'm guessing you haven't gotten around to {action}
examples: I'm guessing you haven't gotten around to talking to my lender?
I'm guessing you haven't gotten around to deciding which houses you want to see this weekend
I'm guessing you haven't gotten around to reviewing the contract I sent you to sign

just_imagine.name: Just Imagine
just_imagine.purpose: Future pacing - getting people to visualize positive outcomes
examples: I know this is a really frustrating process right now, but just imagine how good it will feel to be in your new home next month
I get that you don't want to work with one agent but just imagine how that could simplify the process by working with me and my team

three_options.name: You Have 3 Options
three_options.purpose: Guided choice - presenting options where one is clearly best
three_options.pattern: Best I can tell you have 3 options: {bad_option}, {worse_option}, or {good_option} - what makes the most sense for you?
examples: Best I can tell you have 3 options: you can terminate the contract and start over, you can find a rental, or we can get a contractor to fix the issue for less than $2000 and you're in your new home in 2 weeks - what makes the most sense?
I believe you have 3 options: 1) put search on hold, 2) find something to rent, or 3) get really aggressive and help you find a home you love - which works best?

two_types.name: Two Types of People
two_types.purpose: Identity framing - get them to choose the winning identity
two_types.pattern: In my experience there are 2 types of {people}: the {losing_type} or the {winning_type} - which one are you?
examples: In my experience there are 2 types of buyers: 1st type puts together a plan and are conservative with offers hoping to eventually win, or 2nd type who sees what they want and goes after it aggressively - which one would you say you are?

In this market I've noticed 2 types of buyers: 1st tries to do work on their own and calls listing agents, or 2nd sees the value in having their own representative who provides off-market properties where they don't compete - would you be interested in that?

before_make_mind_up.name: Before You Make Your Mind Up
before_make_mind_up.pattern: Before you make your mind up {value_proposition}
examples: Before you make your mind up I wanted to share with you a way I can save you over $1000 in this transaction
Before you make your mind up I would like to show you the benefits of our VIP Buyer program - do you have a few minutes?
Before you make your mind up I would like you to ask yourself where do you see yourself in a year and is your current approach going to get you there?

five_to_seven.name: 5 to 7 Clients
five_to_seven.pattern: The way my business is setup is that I can only work with about 5 to 7 people at a time and give them the service they deserve - I would love to work with you, would you like to work with me?
examples: Thanks for meeting with me today. I just want to let you know that the way my business is setup is that I can only work with about 5 to 7 people at a time and give them the service I feel they deserve - does that make sense? Perfect, with that in mind I would love to work with you, would you like to work with me?
